You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &lcaron;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Lcaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/013d/index.htm U+0013D].
  * `&lcaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/013e/index.htm U+0013E].
